name: Abel Owens
effect: Abel's value cannot be changed in any way.

name: Alexander Whale
effect: Museum Curator Alexander gains +1 Influence while at the Museum.

name: Alfred Barkum, Jr.
effect: Noon: Pay 1 ghost rock. Target a Wanted Dude. The Dude becomes non-Wanted. Reaction: When a card with "Judge" or "Courthouse" in the title is taking an action, pay 1 ghost rock. Cancel the action.

name: Along the Way Strike
effect: Private. Strike.

name: Archaeological Dig
effect: Out-of-Town. Private. Each player can have any number of Archaeological Digs in play. Card memory does not apply to Archaeological Digs.

name: Arizona Jane Exp.
effect: Experienced. Jane will not call out an Agency Dude. Noon: Jane boots to move to a location you own that contains one or more Dudes controlled by another player. Jane issues an unrefusable call-out to one of the Dudes.

name: Audience
effect: Reaction: Immediately after your posse wins a shootout round, your shooter for the round gains +1 Influence until after Nightfall next turn.

name: Auto-Incendiary Bullets
effect: Bullet. Gadget Difficulty:5 The Auto-Incendiary Bullets' ghost rock cost cannot be lowered. Shootout: Ace Auto-Incendiary Bullets. Ace an opposing Dude.

name: Autogyro
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:6 Noon: Boot the Autogyro to move this Dude to another location. Noon: Boot the Autogyro to move this Dude and another Dude at this Dude's location to another location.

name: Battle for Lord Grimeley's
effect: Until after Nightfall, the Deed worth the most Control Points in play gains 2 Control Points. If multiple Deeds are tied for the most Control Points, each Deed's pulls for it; the Deed with the lowest pull gains the Control Points. Ace this card.

name: Battle Plan
effect: The next Dude aced this turn goes Home booted instead. If multiple Dudes are aced simultaneously, each Dude's controller pulls; the Dude with the lowest pull goes Home booted instead. Ace this card.

name: Billy No-Neck Exp.
effect: Experienced. Billy will not attach Weapons. Shootout: Target an opposing Dude with a Weapon attached. Until the shootout ends, the Dude cannot be the shooter if another Dude can, and the Dude's Bullet rating does not contribute to the number of cards you draw or redraw.

name: Black Jack Exp.2
effect: Experienced 2. Jack is always Wanted. Jack cannot be targeted by an action from a card with "Judge" in the title. Reaction: When a Cheatin'! card targets your shootout Draw hand, if Jack is in your posse, cancel the card's action.

name: Blackjacks- Stoker's Alliance
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Each of your Wanted Dudes gains +1 Influence. Reaction: Immediately before the Upkeep Phase, target one of your Dudes from another Outfit. Lower the Dude's Upkeep cost to 0 until after Nightfall.

name: Blood Oath
effect: Reaction Spirit 6: When bringing a Dude from another Outfit into play, boot this Shaman. If this Spirit succeeds, the Dude becomes a member of your Outfit for the rest of the game.

name: Bloody Face
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in play. Pull. If the pull exceeds the Dude's value, the Dude can be targeted as if he or she were Harrowed, until after Nightfall.

name: Boardinghouse
effect: Public. Controller Reaction: Immediately before the Upkeep Phase, boot the Boardinghouse. Target one of your non-Terror Dudes. Lower the Dude's Upkeep cost to 0 until after Nightfall.

name: Boat Yard
effect: Private. Controller Noon: One of your Dudes moves from either the Town Square or an out-of-town location to either an out-of-town location or the Town Square.

name: Bobo Leveux Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:2 Reaction: Immediately after a Dude unsuccessfully pulls for a Spell, boot Bobo. Ace the Spell.

name: Bone-Tipped Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Discard Bone-Tipped Bullets. Ace an opposing Blessed Dude.

name: Born Under a Strange Star
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in Boot Hill. For the rest of the game, other copies of the Dude can enter play as if a copy of the Dude were not in Boot Hill.

name: Both Barrels
effect: Shootout: Draw two Draw hands for this shootout, including all card-drawing bonuses. Immediately before hands are revealed, discard one hand. Reveal the other. Ace this card.

name: Boxin' Match
effect: Each player may move one of his or her Dudes to the Town Square for a match, ignoring movement restrictions. Each of the Dudes' controllers pulls for the Dude. The Dude (or Dudes) with the highest pull plus Bullet rating gains 5 ghost rock for his or her controller. If more than one Dude is in the match, discard the Dude(s) with the lowest pull.

name: Brewery
effect: Improvement. The Brewery can only be attached to a Saloon. The Brewery's Deed gains +2 production.

name: Burning of the Whateley Estate
effect: Take any Home for your Outfit and place it on your street like a Deed. The Home becomes your new Home. Remove your old Home from play. This Event does not resolve if a copy of it has resolved this game. Ace this card.

name: Buster Madison Exp.
effect: Experienced. Huckster:1 Noon: If Buster is at a Saloon, target another Dude at the Saloon. Take 1 ghost rock from the Dude's controller.

name: Buster's Gambling Hall
effect: Public Casino. Saloon.

name: Cain Regen
effect: Reaction: When Cain becomes Wanted, boot him. He becomes non-Wanted.

name: Candy Shop
effect: Public.

name: Chao Li
effect: Huckster:0 Chao Li has +2 Influence for determining who draws an extra card for having the most total Influence during Nightfall.

name: Charlie Flatbush Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: If Charlie is at an in-town Deed, raise his Influence to equal the Influence of another Dude at the Deed, until after Nightfall.

name: Chinese Ogre
effect: Abomination. While opposing one or more Dudes with higher values in a shootout, the Chinese Ogre has a -2 Bullet penalty.

name: Christopher Hill
effect: Huckster:2 Christopher can attach Miracles. Each Miracle attached to Christopher is considered a Hex.

name: Clock Strikes Thirteen
effect: Until Nightfall, Draw Dudes become Studs and Studs become Draws. Until Nightfall, card effects that make Dudes become Studs instead make the Dudes become Draws, and vice versa. Ace this card.

name: Cobbler Shop
effect: Public. When any player moves a Dude to the Cobbler Shop, the player may pay 1 ghost rock to unboot the Dude.

name: Cold-Iron Bullets
effect: Bullet Shootout: Discard Cold-Iron Bullets. Ace an opposing Huckster.

name: Con Game Gone Bad
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: When another player with a maximum hand size over four reveals an illegal Draw hand, permanently lower the player's maximum hand size by one. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Cover Fire
effect: Reaction: When a Shootout action targets one of your Dudes, boot one of your other Dudes in the same posse. Cancel the action.

name: Deer-Stalkin' Hat
effect: Noon: This Dude moves to a location that contains a Wanted Dude.

name: Denton Filmore
effect: Noon: Boot Denton. Take 2 ghost rock from a Sweetrock player.

name: Double or Nothin'
effect: Reaction: immediately after another player becomes the Winner of Gambling Phase lowball, all players must ante again and play another round of lowball to determine a new Winner. No Events resolve from the new Draw hands. Only one copy of this card can be played per turn.

name: Dr. Lawrence
effect: Mad Scientist:0 Lower Dr. Lawrence's Upkeep cost by 1 (minimum 0) for each Archaeological Dig in play. While Dr. Lawrence is in play, lower by 3 the Difficulty of each Gadget being brought into play if a copy is already in play.

name: Dr. Reginald Branson Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction Pull: When a non-Terror Dude is aced in a shootout, boot Dr. Branson. If the Dude's value exceeds the pull, the Dude is no longer aced and goes to your Home booted.

name: Dread Wolf Pack
effect: Non-Unique. Abomination. The Dread Wolf Pack cannot attach goods. Shootout: If only one Dude is in the opposing posse, the Dread Wolf Pack gains a +3 Bullet bonus until the shootout ends.

name: Dud Round
effect: Reaction: When an action on a card with the Bullet trait is being taken, cancel the action and ace the card.

name: Eagle Rock Exp.
effect: Experienced.

name: Embezzlement
effect: Noon: Until after Nightfall, give control of one of your unbooted Dudes to another player. Take ghost rock from the player equal to the Dude's Influence.

name: End of Time Lode
effect: Private. Strike. Reaction: When another player passes as a Noon action, boot the End of Time Lode. The player is not considered to have passed, and play continues with the player to his or her left.

name: Eye of the Storm
effect: No other Events resolve this turn; discard or ace them as usual. You gain 1 ghost rock for each two Events canceled this way. Ace this card.

name: Faminite
effect: Abomination. The Faminite cannot move to a location that contains a Blessed.

name: Far Away Strike
effect: Private. Strike. Dudes at in-town locations cannot move to the Far Away Strike. Dudes moving from the Far Away Strike cannot move to in-town locations.

name: Faro Table
effect: Improvement. The Faro Table can only be attached to a Casino or Saloon. The Faro Table's Deed gains +1 Control Points.

name: Father Terrance
effect: Blessed:1 Father Terrance's Influence equals the Fear level minus 6 (minimum 0).

name: Feedin' Time
effect: Reaction: Immediately before you bring an Abomination into play, ace one of your Dudes in play.Lower the Abomination's ghost rock cost by the Dude's printed ghost rock cost.

name: Fifth Bowl
effect: Noon Miracle 7: If this Blessed is at a Deed, boot this Blessed. If this Miracle succeeds, no non-Blessed Dudes can move to the Deed until after Nightfall.

name: First Bowl
effect: Noon Miracle 4: If this Miracle succeeds, target a Wanted Dude in play. Until after Nightfall, lower the Dude's Influence to 0.

name: Flamin' Barrels
effect: Shootout: Target a Dude with a ready Weapon in your posse. Until the shootout ends, the Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus.

name: Foreclosed Folly Strike
effect: Private. Strike. Controller Noon: Discard the Foreclosed Folly Strike. Gain 2 ghost rock.

name: Fourth Bowl
effect: Unique. Shootout Miracle 11: If this Miracle succeeds, ace an opposing Dude, then discard this card.

name: Francis Whateley
effect: Huckster:2 Reaction: Immediately before a Huckster casts a Spell at Francis's or an adjacent location, Francis adds his Huckster rating to the Huckster's.

name: Fresh Horses
effect: Noon: Unboot all Horse cards in one location. Any actions on the cards that have been used this turn can be used an extra time.

name: Front Porch
effect: Non-Unique. Improvement. Dudes at this location who can move to the Town Square can call out Dudes at adjacent locations who can move to the Town Square. If such a call-out is accepted, both Dudes move to the Town Square before posses form. The shootout takes place at the Town Square.

name: Funeral Procession
effect: Noon: Target one of your Dudes in Boot Hill. Add the Dude's Influence to your total during Nightfall.

name: Gadget Warehouse
effect: Private. Controller Noon Pull: Target a Gadget in your hand and pay the Gadget's ghost rock cost. If the pull exceeds the Gadget's Difficulty, attach the Gadget to one of your Dudes at the Gadget Warehouse. Otherwise, discard the Gadget.

name: Gas Lamp
effect: Improvement. The Gas Lamp can only be attached to the Town Square. Each player can have any number of Gas Lamps in play. Card memory does not apply to Gas Lamps. Each Abomination in the Town Square has a -1 Bullet penalty.

name: Ghost Rock Fever
effect: Until Nightfall, lower by 2 (minimum 0) the Control Points of each Strike with a value under 5, and lower by 1 (minimum 0) the Control Points of each Strike with a value over 4.

name: Glassmaker
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Boot the Glassmaker and pay 2 ghost rock. A Brothel, Casino, or Saloon permanently gains +1 Production. A Deed can only have its Production raised this way once.

name: Grendel's Eye Strike
effect: Private. Strike. Card effects cannot change the Control Points or Production of the Grendel's Eye Strike.

name: Guide
effect: Reaction Miracle 4: When one of your Dudes is aced in this Blessed's or an adjacent location, perform this Miracle. If this Miracle succeeds, remove any number of Goods attached to the Dude and attach them to this Blessed.

name: Gus Gallagher Exp.
effect: Experienced. Gus can boot to join a posse from any location as if he were adjacent to the shootout's location.

name: Ham-Handed Play
effect: Reaction: Immediately before you reveal a legal Draw hand, raise the hand by two ranks. The hand is considered the worst possible hand of its rank and becomes illegal.

name: Harold Longfellow Exp.
effect: Experienced. You can bring Maze Rats Dudes into play at Harold's location instead of at your Home.

name: Headless Horseman
effect: Abomination. Noon: The Headless Horseman moves to the Town Square.

name: Here Comes the Cavalry
effect: Shootout: Target any of your Dudes with Horses attached. All of the Dudes move to the shootout's location and join your posse.

name: Holy Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Discard Holy Bullets. Ace an opposing Harrowed Dude. The Dude's controller does not make the Harrowed pull.

name: Homeless Joe
effect: Improvement. Controller Noon: If you have less than four cards in your hand, draw a card.

name: Hoodoo
effect: Abomination. While at a Strike, Hoodoo gains a +2 Bullet bonus and +2 Influence.

name: Horned Owl's Fury
effect: Shootout Spirit 5: Target one of your Dudes with a ready Weapon in the shootout. If this Spirit succeeds, the Weapon gains a +2 Bullet bonus for the shootout.

name: Horse Racetrack
effect: Public.

name: Hot-loaded Rounds
effect: Shootout: Target a Weapon card. Until this shootout round ends, the card gains a +3 Bullet bonus. Immediately after Draw hands are revealed this round, ace the card.

name: Humphrey Walters Exp.
effect: Experienced. Lycanthrope. Town Founder. Noon: Boot Humphrey. Target another Dude at Humphrey's location. Raise the Dude's Influence by Humphrey's Influence, then lower Humphrey's Influence to 0 until after Nightfall. Shootout Pull: You can take this action once per shootout. If the pull is red or if a Full Moon resolved this turn, bring the Werewolf into play unbooted from your Play hand in place of Humphrey and add Humphrey to your Play hand, discarding attached cards.

name: Idleness Exp.
effect: Experienced. Blessed:1 Noon: Boot Idleness. Boot another Dude at Idleness's location.

name: Infared Spectacles
effect: Gadget Difficulty:6 Reaction: Immediately after this Dude moves to a location to call out a Dude at the location, boot the Infrared Spectacles. The target cannot refuse the call-out.

name: Intimidation
effect: Shootout: Boot one of your Dudes in this shootout. Target an opposing Dude. Until the shootout ends, lower the target Dude's Bullet rating by your Dude's Influence (minimum 0). If the target Dude ever has a Bullet rating of 0 during the rest of the shootout, the Dude becomes a Draw until the shootout ends.

name: Investment Broker
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 10 ghost rock. The Investment Broker permanently gains 1 Control Point.

name: It's Just You and Me
effect: Shootout: For this shootout round, Bullet ratings of Dudes other than the shooters do not contribute to the number of cards drawn or redrawn. Such Dudes cannot be aced due to Draw hand resolution this round.

name: Jenny Cooper
effect: Shootout: Move Jenny from her posse to an in-town location. One of your Law Dogs can move from any location to the shootout's location and join the posse.

name: Joseph Eyes-Like-Rain Exp.
effect: Experienced. Shaman:5 While Joseph is in play, no other player may draw an extra card for having the most total Influence during Nightfall. Noon: Boot Joseph and discard a Spirit attached to him. Until after Nightfall, lower the value of each Abomination in play by the Fear level (minimum A).

name: Joseph's Return
effect: Each Terror in play has -1 Influence (minimum 0) until after Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Killer Kerry
effect: Reaction: When one or more Dudes in a posse are chickening out between shootout rounds, boot Kerry. All Dudes in the posse must stay for another round.

name: Last Rites
effect: Miracle Reaction 5: Immediately before a Harrowed Dude is aced, perform this Miracle. If the Miracle succeeds, the Dude goes to Boot Hill without the Harrowed pull.

name: Lemat Pistol
effect: Weapon. Shotgun. Shootout: Discard the Lemat Pistol. Ace an opposing Dude with a value less than or equal to this Dude's Bullet rating.

name: Looking Glass
effect: Noon Hex 6: If this Huckster is at an in-town Deed and this Hex succeeds, then until after Nightfall your Dudes are adjacent to all other in-town Deeds while at the Deed.

name: Lost in the Badlands
effect: Reaction: When a Dude is moving to an out-of-town Deed, move the Dude to another out-of-town Deed of your choice.

name: Low Profile
effect: Noon Pull: Target a Wanted Dude. If the pull exceeds the Dude's value, the Dude and all attached cards go into their owners' hands.

name: Mad Dog Campbell
effect: You must pay Mad Dog 1 ghost rock whenever he joins a posse; if you do not, discard him.

name: Magic Bus
effect: Horse. Gadget Difficulty:7 Shootout: Boot the Magic Bus to move this Dude and any of your other Dudes at this Dude's location to the shootout's location. They join your posse.

name: Magnum Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Discard Magnum Bullets. Until the shootout ends, negate card effects that prevent opposing Dudes from being aced.

name: Mark of Death
effect: Unique. Shootout Hex 12: If this Hex succeeds, ace an opposing Dude. Discard this card.

name: Mark of Famine
effect: Noon Hex 6: Boot this Huckster. Target a Deed in play. If this Hex succeeds, lower the Deed's Production to 0 until the next High Noon.

name: Mark of Man
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in play. Lower the Dude's value by 3 (minimum A), until after Nightfall.

name: Mark of Pestilence
effect: Noon Hex X: Target a Dude at this Huckster's or an adjacent location. X is the Dude's value. If this Hex succeeds, lower the Dude's value by 1 at the end of each High Noon for the rest of the game. If the Dude's value drops below A, ace the Dude, who goes to Boot Hill and cannot return to play in any way. Discard this card.

name: Mark of War
effect: Noon Hex 10: If this Hex succeeds, Dudes cannot refuse call-outs until after Nightfall. Discard this card.

name: Mark Preston
effect: No Dude with a value less than Mark's can call him out without a card effect.

name: Mask
effect: This Dude does not become Wanted for joining a posse in a shootout at another player's Private location.

name: Maze Rats- Landed Rats
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Each of your Deeds owned by another player and worth at least 1 Control Point is worth +1 Control Points. During the Upkeep Phase, you may collect Production for Deeds you control but do not own.

name: Misdirection
effect: Cheatin'! Reaction: When another player reveals an illegal Draw hand, boot a number of Dudes controlled by the player, up to his or her hand rank. Only one Cheatin'! card can be played against a player per draw.

name: Monopoly
effect: Noon: Select one of these traits: Brothel, Saloon, or Government. When Nightfall begins this turn, any player who controls all Deeds with the trait in play gains 1 Control Point until Nightfall ends.

name: Museum
effect: Public. The Museum's Control Points equal the number of Archaeological Digs in play.

name: Nate Hunter Exp.2
effect: Experienced 2 Reaction: When your opponent in a shootout reveals an illegal Draw hand, get a Cheatin'! card from your deck or discard pile and immediately play it. Shuffle the deck if the card came from it.

name: Nature's Wrath
effect: Noon Spirit 4: If this Spirit succeeds, target an unbooted Dude in play. Until after Nightfall, while the Dude is at his or her Home, lower the Dude's Influence to 0.

name: Nebuchadnezzar
effect: Abomination. Shootout: Boot one of your Hucksters. Raise Nebuchadnezzar's Bullet rating by the Huckster's Huckster rating.

name: Nelson Roberts Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: Immediately after a Dude boots to join a posse, lower Nelson's Bullet rating to 0 until the shootout ends and boot a card attached to Nelson with "Rifle" in the title. The Dude still boots but does not move or join the posse.

name: Nick's Never Closes
effect: Public. Saloon. The controller of Nick's Never Closes has -1 total Influence during Nightfall.

name: No Mint Juleps Here
effect: Noon: Target a location you own or control. Boot the Dude(s) with the highest Influence at the location.

name: Panic Attack
effect: Noon Pull: If the Fear level is over 7, target a Dude in play and boot one of your Terrors at the Dude's location. If the pull plus the number of Terrors at the location exceeds the Dude's value, discard the Dude.

name: Papa's Lode Strike
effect: Private. Strike. Papa's Lode Strike has 0 Production until the next Strike enters play. When the next Strike enters play, permanently raise the Production of Papa's Lode Strike to equal the Strike's Production.

name: Peace Pipe
effect: Mystical. Only a Shaman can attach the Peace Pipe. Reaction: Immediately before this Shaman pulls for a Spirit, discard the Peace Pipe. Double the Shaman's Shaman rating for the pull.

name: Pennsylvania Kid
effect: The Pennsylvania Kid cannot be aced in a shootout if another Dude in his posse can be aced instead.

name: Piano Player
effect: Improvement. The Piano Player can only be attached to a Brothel. The Piano Player's Deed gains +2 Production.

name: Pipe
effect: Noon: Boot this Dude at an in-town Deed. Until after Nightfall, each Dude at the Deed has -1 Influence.

name: Postal Fine
effect: Noon: Target a player with over than five cards in his or her hand. For each card over five, the player must either pay 1 ghost rock or send one of the cards to Boot Hill.

name: Pride Exp.
effect: Experienced. Reaction: Immediately before a card effect removes Pride from a shootout, negate the effect.

name: Prof. Susan Franklin Exp.
effect: Experienced. Mad Scientist:1 Noon: If Prof. Franklin is at her Home, boot her. Target a player. Look at the player's hand.

name: Psychic Projector
effect: Gadget Difficulty:4 Noon: Boot this Dude. Target another Dude in play. Until after Nightfall, the target Dude gains Influence equal to this Dude's Influence. Until after nightfall, lower this Dude's Influence to 0.

name: Pump
effect: Improvement. The Pump can only be attached to a Strike worth at least 1 Control Point. Raise the Control Points of the Pump's Deed by 1.

name: Purging of the Golden Mare
effect: Each player may remove any copies of Dudes or Deeds in play or in any Boot Hill from his or her deck, Play hand, and discard pile. Such cards go to their owners' Boot Hill.

name: Rats In Gomorra
effect: Noon: Any number of your Dudes moves from one location to another.

name: Reckoner's Bullet
effect: Unique. Bullet. Only a Terror with a ready Weapon attached can attach the Reckoner's Bullet. The ghost rock cost of the Reckoner's Bullet cannot be lowered. Shootout: Ace the Reckoner's Bullet. Ace an opposing Dude.

name: Reggie Cornell
effect: Non-Unique. Reggie's Influence cannot be lowered in any way. Events cannot ace or discard Reggie; cancel any Event that would do so.

name: Richard Boothe Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: If Richard is at a Strike, boot him. Gain ghost rock equal to the Strike's Production, then lower the Production to 0 until the next High Noon.

name: Roll of Dimes
effect: Bullet. Reaction: Immediately before this Dude takes an action on one of his or her attached cards with "Shotgun" in the title or with the Shotgun trait, ace the Roll o' Dimes. This Dude gains a +5 Bullet bonus until the action ends.

name: Run, You Coward!
effect: Reaction: When a Dude leaves a shootout by chickening out or by a card effect from the Dude's controller, play this card. For the rest of the game, while one or more of your Dudes oppose the Dude in a shootout, lower the Dude's Influence to 0, the Dude has a -1 Bullet penalty (minimum 0), and the Dude becomes a Draw.

name: Saloon's on Fire
effect: Target one of your Saloons. That Saloon catches fire; ace it. Permanently raise by 1 the Control Points of each other Saloon in play. Ace this card.

name: Sam Horowitz Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: If Sam is at a Deed you control or own, boot him and he becomes Wanted. Ace the Deed.

name: Scared Stiff Saloon
effect: Public. Saloon. Controller Shootout: Until after Nightfall, lower to 0 the Bullet rating of each Dude with a value less than the Fear level at the Scared Stiff Saloon.

name: Second Bowl
effect: Noon Miracle 6: If this Miracle succeeds, target a Strike in play. Until the next High Noon, lower the Strike's Control Points and Production to 0.

name: Seldon Harrison
effect: An Agency player cannot control Seldon. Seldon will not call out a Texas Ranger.

name: Seventh Bowl
effect: Unique. Noon Miracle 16: Ace this Blessed. If this Miracle succeeds, target all Dudes in play. Each of the Dudes' controllers pulls for the Dude. If a Dude's pull equals or exceeds the Dude's value, ace the Dude.

name: Seventh-Sign Strike
effect: Private. Strike. Each non-Terror, non-Blessed Dude at the Seventh-Sign Strike has a -2 Bullet penalty (minimum 0) and has his or her value lowered by 3. If a Dude's value drops under A at the Seventh-Sign Strike, ace the Dude.

name: Shallow Grave
effect: Noon: Target a Dude in Boot Hill. Shuffle all copies of the Dude in Boot Hill back into their owners' decks.

name: Sheila Mirabella Exp.
effect: Experienced. Noon: Attach a Goods card to Sheila without ghost rock cost. When Nightfall ends, discard the Goods.

name: Shigetoshi Hohiro
effect: Blessed:1 Reaction Pull: Immediately after a Huckster at Shigetoshi's location pulls for a hex, boot Shigetoshi. If your pull exceeds the Huckster's skill rating plus pull, the Huckster goes Home booted.

name: Shotgun Wedding
effect: Noon: Boot one of your cards with "Chapel," "Church," or "Courthouse" in the title. Target a Dude in town. Give the Dude's controller ghost rock equal to the Dude's Influence. The Dude cannot call out your Dudes for the rest of the game. The Dude's controller can boot a card he or she controls with "Church" or "Courthouse" in the title as a Noon action to lift the restriction. Ace this card.

name: Sidewalk
effect: Non-Unique. Improvement. Dudes can move to an adjacent location from this one without booting, but must boot if they move back to this location the same turn.

name: Silas Peacock Exp.
effect: Experienced. Whenever a Dude goes to Boot Hill, boot Silas.

name: Silver Bullets
effect: Bullet. Shootout: Discard Silver Bullets. Ace an opposing Abomination.

name: Sioux Union- War Party
effect: Starting Ghost Rock:19 Shootout: Boot one of your Shamans. Target one of your Sioux Dudes in this shootout. Until the shootout ends, the Dude gains a Bullet bonus equal to the Shaman's Shaman rating. Cancel the bonus if either Dude has a Weapon ready that non-Sioux could attach.

name: Sixth Bowl
effect: Noon Miracle X: Boot this Blessed. Target a Terror in your Play hand. Reveal the Terror to the other players. X is the Terror's ghost rock cost. If this Miracle succeeds, bring the Terror into play at this Blessed's location without ghost rock cost.

name: Skunky Swade Exp.
effect: Experienced. Skunky's Influence does not contribute to your total during Nightfall. While Skunky is at one of your Deeds, you collect the Deed's Production as if you were the owner.

name: Sleep o' the Dead
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains the ability "Noon: Boot a Dude with a lower value at this Dude's location." Ace this card.

name: Spare Chamber
effect: Reaction: Immediately after a Bullet card attached to this Dude is discarded or aced, discard the Spare Chamber. Reattach the Bullet card to this dude.

name: Spirit's Eyes
effect: While Spirit's Eyes is in a posse, your Shamans outside of the posse can call Spirits as if they were in the posse.

name: Spurs
effect: No Dude may attach more than one Spurs. This Dude gains +1 Influence while at an in-town location. Noon: Unboot a non-Gadget Horse attached to this Dude. You may take each action on the Horse an extra time this turn, if you already took it this turn.

name: Stained-Glass Windows
effect: Improvement. Stained-Glass Windows can only be attached to an in-town Deed.During a shootout at this location, any player with a Dude in the shootout may, as a Shootout action, throw the fight through the window into the Town Square: discard Stained-Glass Windows and move both posses to the Town Square, ignoring movement restrictions; any Dudes at the Town Square can immediately join a posse.

name: Stand Alone, Die Alone
effect: Raise each Wanted Dude's Upkeep cost by 1 until Nightfall. Ace this card.

name: Statute 32 of the Penal Code
effect: Unready all Weapons in play. Weapons cannot be made ready until after Nightfall. Weapons attached this turn are unready. Immediately after Nightfall, each Dude can ready one of his or her Weapons.

name: Stayin' Put
effect: Reaction Hex 4: When one of your Dudes joins a posse, cast this Hex. If this Hex succeeds, another player's card effects cannot remove the Dude from the shootout.

name: Stoker versus Knicknevin
effect: Noon: If your highest-value Dude is at the Town Square and the highest-value Dude controlled by another player is at the Town Square or an adjacent location, your Dude issues an unrefusable call-out to the other Dude. The other Dude moves to the Town Square for the shootout, ignoring movement restrictions. No other Dudes can join.

name: Storage Shed
effect: Private. If ownership of the Storage Shed changes, cards under it go to their owners' discard piles. Owner Noon: If the Storage Shed has fewer than five cards under it, boot it. Place a card under it from your Play hand. Owner Noon: Boot the Storage Shed and discard your Play hand. Take the cards under the Storage Shed for your Play hand.

name: Sun In His Eyes
effect: Shaman:0

name: Supernatural Smarts
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains +1 Influence. Ace this card.

name: Supernatural Speed
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains a +1 Bullet bonus. Ace this card.

name: Tailoring Shop
effect: Private. Controller Noon: Pay 1 ghost rock. Until after Nightfall, a Dude at the Tailoring Shop gains +1 Influence. You can take this action any number of times per turn, but only once per Dude per turn.

name: Tax Season
effect: Each player must discard a third of his or her ghost rock, rounding down any fractions. Ace this card.

name: Termite Infestation
effect: Noon: Target an in-town Deed worth at least one Control Point. Boot the Deed. Until a player boots one of his or her Dudes at the Deed as a Noon action, the Deed cannot be unbooted, is considered to have a blank text box, and is worth 0 Control Points. The Deed's Production or Upkeep cost remains the same.

name: The Drifter
effect: The Drifter's Upkeep cost cannot be reduced.

name: The End is Nigh
effect: If the Fear Level is over 7, gain 1 Control Point until after Nightfall.

name: The House Always Wins
effect: Until after the Gambling Phase next turn, players cannot play Cheatin'! cards, but each illegal hand revealed is considered the worst possible hand: for lowball, a Dead Man's Hand, and for any other Draw, a non-Flush A,2,3,4,6.

name: The Missionary
effect: Blessed:2 Reaction: Immediateley before a Dude pulls for a Hex or Spirit, raise the Spell's Difficulty by The Missionary's Blessed rating.

name: Third Bowl
effect: Noon Miracle 9: If this Blessed is at a Deed and this Miracle succeeds, ace this card. Discard the Deed.

name: Thunderbird
effect: Shaman:3 Only a Sioux player can bring the Thunderbird into play.

name: Tinker
effect: Reaction: Immediately before a Mad Scientist pulls to create a Weapon Gadget, raise the Gadget Difficulty by 2. If the pull succeeds, the Gadget gains a permanent +1 Bullet bonus.

name: Together at Last
effect: Shootout: When you select your shooter for this shootout round, select another Dude in your posse. The Dude's Bullet rating adds to the number of cards you draw or redraw for this shootout round.

name: Tomb Guardian
effect: Abomination. While the Tomb Guardian is at a location you own, if it has not moved this turn, it gains a +3 Bullet bonus and becomes a Stud.

name: Trackin' Teeth
effect: Noon Harrowed Power: Target one of your unbooted Harrowed Dudes. For the rest of the game, the Dude gains the ability "Noon: Target a Dude at this Dude's location. Immediately after the target Dude moves, this Dude can move to the same location as a Reaction. If a different Dude is already this action's target, the Dude is no longer targeted." Ace this card.

name: Trading Post
effect: Public. The Trading Post's controller can attach Goods to booted Dudes.

name: Two Birds Chirping
effect: Shaman:1 Two Birds cannot call Spirits with values over 9.

name: Wendigo Garrison
effect: If you reveal an illegal shootout Draw hand while Wendigo is in your posse, raise your hand rank by one rank to the worst possible hand of that rank.

name: Western Union Offices
effect: Public. Controller Noon: Pay 1 ghost rock to move a Goods attached to one of your Dudes to another of your booted or unbooted Dudes in play, even if the Dude attaching the Goods is at a location you do not control.

name: White Horse
effect: Reaction: Immediately before Nightfall, White Horse boots to move to a location containing another Dude.

name: Wrath O' God
effect: Discard the Deed worth the most Control Points in play. If more than one Deed has the most Control Points, each Deed's controller pulls for it. Discard the Deed with the highest pull. Ace this card.
